segments.text: Ugh, look at that filthy mess in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is spewing water everywhere, soaking the counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor is growing, all slimy and wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman steps right into it while drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not smell the dampness or feel the splash?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dirty water streaming down the cabinet doors is revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids are adding to the chaos with their cookie grab.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on that stool, hand deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies might fall into the water below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaches up, probably getting her shoes wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor will be a slippery, grimy hazard soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice garden view can't mask this indoor grossness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't want to clean up that nasty spill.
segments.speaker: PAR
